name: Projector Shelf for Wall, Aluminum Alloy WiFi Router Wall Mount Shelf Easy to Dissipate Heat, Wall Floating Shelves/Stand/Rack/Holder/Bracket for Game Console/Speaker/Cabel Box/DVD Player
short_description: [FASHION DESIGN] Floating shelves wall mount projector shelf is uniquely designed, exhibiting ultimate practicality and fashion. floating projector shelf for wall can not only hold your Wi-Fi router, projector but also be used to store and place small electronic devices such as smart speaker, cable box, DVD player, smart speaker, AV equipment. wall floating shelves fully utilizes vertical wall space for storage, making the overall space clean, orderly, and beautiful. If you want to add some extra storage space, our shelves for wall are the perfect solution.

[FAST HEAT DISSIPATION] Our wall mount floating router shelf 's pentagram star vent design is its best feature. The pentagram shape formed by multiple circular holes is not only beautiful and unique, but also increases the ventilation of the wall mount shelves, allowing the heat of devices such as Projector/Wifi router/Modem to be better distributed, thus maintaining device stability and reducing the risk of failure. At the same time, we designed a large rectangular hole at the end of the wall shelf no dirll to facilitate the storage and organization of equipment wires.

[GUARDRAILS PROVIDE PROTECTION] Floating shelf for under tv has superior load-bearing capacity and can easily support small devices such as your router and projector. The guardrails on both ends and the slightly tilted design at the end provide better support and stability, while preventing equipment from slipping or breaking. When you need to place a wider device, simply install the floating wall stand upside down and you'll be ready.

[HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS] Floating gaming shelf is made of lightweight space aluminum alloy, which is not only strong and lightweight, but also features fast heat dissipation. The outer layer of the projector wall mount shelf is coated with a matte black finish, giving it a stylish feel while also making it extremely easy to clean. Whether placed in the living room, bedroom, study, kitchen, bathroom, bedside, office, conference room, home theater, gaming room, and under TV, this floating storage shelf can add a beautiful touch to your home and office environment.

[2 INSTALLATION METHODS] Our aluminum alloy wifi router shelf wall mount offer 2 installation methods to meet your different needs: 1) Adhesive. Advantage: No Drilling, No Damage to the wall. TIP: Wait 48 hours after taping before place items to ensure it's firmly fixed. 2) Screw and Anchor, Advantage: Capable of hold more heavy items. Different installation methods are suitable for different walls, No matter which installation method you choose, our floating wall shelves for electronics can easily integrate into your home and office environment.

[After Sales Service] If you encounter any unsatisfactory issues while using our black projector wall shelf, please don't hesitate to contact us directly for a replacement or refund. This is a shopping experience without risks.

name: Router Shelf Wall Mount Foldable - 14-inch Floating Metal Shelf w/Cable Hole & Heat Vents - Fold Up Space-Saving Holder for Modem Router/WiFi Fit/Mesh Device & TV Boxes (14" W×8" D, White)
short_description: 【Floating & Foldable Design】SKIKEN 14-inch Wall Mounted Router Shelf features a foldable design - easily fold up when not in use to save space. Securely holds routers, smart speakers, and charging devices while keeping them elevated for easier cleaning. Say goodbye to routers hidden in sofa corners! Perfect for small areas like desks, workbenches, or tight corners (ideal for MINI projectors/small fans).

【Large 14"W×8"D Surface】Unlike small WiFi shelves, our wall shelf offers a spacious 14"W×8"D area, holding 2+ WiFi routers (or 1 router + modem with power adapters). Ideal for WiFi Fit, mesh device & more.

【Cable Management & Ventilation】Equipped with a 4.9"×1" cable port and heat vents for organized wiring and improved airflow. This wall stand efficiently organizes WiFi routers, modems, Echo devices, small fans, and other compact electronics, keeping your space clutter-free.
【Space-Saving & Sturdy Metal】Durable metal construction supports heavy gadgets like WiFi routers and modems. Fold up to clear space or extend for MINI projectors/game consoles.
【Product Dimensions & Package Contents】Product Dimensions: 14.0" W × 8.0" D × 2.3" H | Weight: 1.74 lbs | Includes: Metal shelf ×1; Drywall anchors ×2; Wall anchors ×2; Screws ×2.

【Installation Tips】1. For optimal load-bearing support, at least one screw MUST be secured into a wall stud. This ensures maximum stability. 2. Select appropriate screws for your wall type. Longer screws may be purchased at hardware stores if needed.
